name: dbase_get_record
purpose: Gets a record from a database as an indexed array

return.description:
An indexed array with the record. This array will also include an associative
   key named deleted which is set to 1 if the record has been 
   marked for deletion (see dbase_delete_record).Each field is converted to the appropriate PHP type, except:
   
    
     
      Dates are left as strings.
     
    
    
     
      Integers that would have caused an overflow (> 32 bits)
      are returned as strings.On error, dbase_get_record will return FALSE.
